DelegateWallets.description: Delegate wallets let you prove ownership of a wallet that you don’t want to connect.
DelegateWallets.link: Link your main wallet to a delegate using <0>delegate.cash</0> – includes a transaction fee.
DelegateWallets.connect: Come back and connect your delegated wallet.
DelegateWallets.perks: Get all the perks of your vaulted wallet while it stays unconnected.

subtitle.error: There was an issue confirming your wallet.

home.content: A wallet lets you send, receive, and manage your cryptocurrencies and NFTs.
home.title: A home for digital assets

login.content: Connecting your wallet somewhere lets you “login” and put your assets to use.
login.title: A new way to login

collaborativeCommerce.content: Assets in your wallet can unlock perks like exclusive products or discounts.
collaborativeCommerce.title: Your key to web3 commerce
